posts.message:
Interesting map about Github users in Africa. Note that they only count people who state their location in their profile, so number may not be accurate.
16.5% Egypt, 6.5% Nigeria, & 9.75% Kenya
posts.caption: codeafrica.org
posts.description: This map represents all GitHub users as of March 15, 2013 who had their profile location in GitHub set to either an African country or city.

posts.message:
Jobs: Quality Control Engineer 2 years Experience

Diagnosoft for Healthcare  (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a Quality Control Engineer with the following specs:
B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or Engineering.
Minimum 2 years experience  in testing Client server applications, web services and desktop-based systems.
Experience with MS SQL databases and MS SQL scripting.
Experience with all phases of software testing (Functional,  Integration, Regression, and User Acceptance).
In-depth knowledge of test case creation and test case execution.
Solid knowledge with software technologies including: HTML, XML, C++, and .NET.
Knowledge of Team Foundation Server (TFS) is a plus..
Knowledge of Agile development life lifecycles.
ISTQB Certificate is a plus
 
Please send your resume to suha.maarouf@diagnosoft.com and write (QCTY) in the subject line of the email
posts.caption: diagnosoft.com
posts.description: Innovative software analysis tools for healthcare, including HARP®, the most accurate and reliable solution for measuring heart function using tagged MRI.

Diagnosoft for Healthcare  (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a software Engineer with the following specs:

posts.caption: thedailywtf.com
posts.description: To many people, including Ron Owens, the word "some" refers to a relatively small amount in between "none" and "most". But To Ron's employer, and especially in the context of "job responsibly include... some maintenance of legacy VB6 applications", the word "some" tends to mean "pretty much all day…
